My 16 year old daughter (god, I feel so old!) came home from school moaning because she was assigned this book in her lit class and was loathe to read it.  Because I remember how difficult it was for me to get through, I thought I would see if there was an audio book available.  YAY!  Thank you for helping me, to help my daughter. ;o)
